info.description: API Server for Load Stuffing Calculator application.
info.title: Load Stuffing Calculator API

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns access and refresh tokens.
Rotates the refresh token and issues a new access token.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of containers.

post.description: Creates a new container type. Requires admin privileges.

put.description: Updates an existing container. Requires admin privileges.

delete.description: Deletes a container by ID. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Returns aggregated statistics for the dashboard based on user role.
Checks if the server is running and returns basic info.
Retrieves a paginated list of permissions.

post.description: Creates a new permission. Requires admin privileges.

put.description: Updates an existing permission. Requires admin privileges.

delete.description: Deletes a permission by ID. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of plans.

post.description: Creates a new load plan with a container and items.

get.description: Retrieves plan details including items and stats.

post.description: Triggers the packing calculation for a plan.
Adds a new item to an existing plan.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific item in a plan.

put.description: Updates a specific item in a plan.

delete.description: Deletes a specific item from a plan.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of products.

post.description: Creates a new product. Requires admin privileges.

put.description: Updates an existing product. Requires admin privileges.

delete.description: Deletes a product by ID. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of roles.

post.description: Creates a new role. Requires admin privileges.

put.description: Updates an existing role. Requires admin privileges.

delete.description: Deletes a role by ID. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Retrieves a list of permission IDs assigned to a role.

put.description: Replaces all permissions for a role. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users.

post.description: Creates a new user with the specified role. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: Retrieves user details by their ID.

put.description: Updates an existing user. Requires admin privileges.

delete.description: Deletes a user by ID. Requires admin privileges.

put.description: Changes the password for a specific user. Requires admin privileges.

container_id.description: Preset container if null using custom container

status.description: DRAFT, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, PARTIAL, FAILED, CANCELLED
DRAFT, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, PARTIAL, FAILED, CANCELLED
